column1: Your query : (( TITLE ( runoff ) OR TITLE ( "overland flow" ) OR TITLE ( streamflow ) ) AND ( SRCTITLE ( "Journal of Hydrology" ) OR SRCTITLE ( "Hydrological Processes" ) OR SRCTITLE ( "Water Resources Research" ) OR SRCTITLE ( "Advances in Water Resources" ) OR SRCTITLE ( "Water Resources Management" ) OR SRCTITLE ( "Hydrology and Earth System Sciences" ) OR SRCTITLE ( "Hydrological Sciences Journal" ) OR SRCTITLE ( "Hydrology Research" ) OR SRCTITLE ( "Water Research" ) OR SRCTITLE ( "Agricultural Water Management" ) ) AND PUBYEAR > 1999 AND PUBYEAR < 2024 AND ( LIMIT-TO ( EXACTSRCTITLE,"Journal Of Hydrology" ) OR LIMIT-TO ( EXACTSRCTITLE,"Water Resources Research" ) OR LIMIT-TO ( EXACTSRCTITLE,"Hydrological Processes" ) OR LIMIT-TO ( EXACTSRCTITLE,"Agricultural Water Management" ) OR LIMIT-TO ( EXACTSRCTITLE,"Hydrology And Earth System Sciences" ) OR LIMIT-TO ( EXACTSRCTITLE,"Water Research" ) OR LIMIT-TO ( EXACTSRCTITLE,"Advances In Water Resources" ) OR LIMIT-TO ( EXACTSRCTITLE,"Water Resources Management" ) OR LIMIT-TO ( EXACTSRCTITLE,"Hydrological Sciences Journal" ) ) )
